author: bchain99
content: Hi folks, i have a question regarding EIP-4844. I see that the kzg commitment computation for proof verification happens only during addition of a blob tx along with its blob to the txpool. It doesn't happen during block building nor blob building. Am i right in my understanding here?

author: bchain99
content: I understand that KZG commitments computation are something that is going to be expensive going forward, i want to cross check where in the protocol we are doing this expensive computation

author: bchain99
content: as far as i can tell, i only see it in the execution layer and it happens only during addition to the blob tx pool.
